description: Retrieves the details of an application associated with an instance of IAM Identity Center.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: ApplicationArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the ARN of the application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationProviderArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the application provider under which the operation will run.

nested_items.name: InstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IAM Identity Center application under which the operation will run. For more information about ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and Amazon Web Services Service Namespaces in the Amazon Web Services General Reference.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the application is enabled or disabled.

nested_items.name: PortalOptions
nested_items.description: A structure that describes the options for the portal associated with an application.

nested_items.name: SignInOptions
nested_items.description: A structure that describes the sign-in options for the access portal.

nested_items.name: Origin
nested_items.description: This determines how IAM Identity Center navigates the user to the target application. It can be one of the following values:
APPLICATION: IAM Identity Center redirects the customer to the configured ApplicationUrl.
IDENTITY_CENTER: IAM Identity Center uses SAML identity-provider initiated authentication to sign the customer directly into a SAML-based application.

nested_items.name: ApplicationUrl
nested_items.description: The URL that accepts authentication requests for an application. This is a required parameter if the Origin parameter is APPLICATION.

nested_items.name: Visibility
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this application is visible in the access portal.

nested_items.name: CreatedDate
nested_items.description: The date the application was created.
